definition: to renew or extend a contract
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Delio Rossi says he's ready to discuss a new contract with Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 羅西表示他已經準備好和球隊進行續約談判。

sentences.english: Goalkeeper Matteo Sereni has returned to the negotiating table over extending his stay with Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 門將塞雷尼重新開始了和拉齊奧的續約談判。

sentences.english: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger wants Holland international Dennis Bergkamp to sign a new two-year contract by Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 阿仙奴領隊雲格希望荷蘭國腳柏金在聖誕前續約兩年。

sentences.english: The Los Angeles Lakers have re-signed free agent guard Shannon Brown.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉磯湖人隊今日正式與後衛香濃布朗續約。

sentences.english: Fiorentina announce that the contract of defender Alessandro Gamberini has been renewed, lasting until 2013.
sentences.chinese: 佛羅倫薩官方正式宣佈，續約甘貝利尼至2013年。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the team nova Qiao liberal arts' supplementary contract question is also repeatedly delays.
sentences.chinese: 再者，球隊新星喬文科的續約問題也是一拖再拖。

sentences.english: I have a contract re-negotiation coming up, " he revealed."
sentences.chinese: 我的續約談判很快就要開始了。

sentences.english: Spearing is expected to join Darby in the signing of a new deal with the club.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮靈將會緊隨達比與俱樂部簽訂續約合同。

sentences.english: Juventus captain Alessandro del Piero admits he's yet to open new contract talks with the club.
sentences.chinese: 斑馬王子皮耶羅承認他還沒有和尤文商談續約事宜。

sentences.english: "Both the club and myself are ready to extend our relationship, " said the left-sided midfielder.
sentences.chinese: 球隊和我本人都已經爲續約準備好了。

sentences.english: At the end of the 3-year period, the parties may renew the Agreement on terms to be agreed.
sentences.chinese: 在三年結束之後，雙方可以按照原協議條款續約。

sentences.english: Were you always confident a deal would be done?
sentences.chinese: 對於續約一事，你是否一直都成竹在胸？

definition: to expire/to run out/to come to an end
the end of fixed period in office/expiration of a term
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to promote to a higher position
